Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Kedzie
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Kedzie, 79th, Columbus, & 87th due to street blockage near 87th/Kedzie.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 87th, Kedzie, 79th, Columbus, and 87th, due to street blockage near 87th/Kedzie.

Allow extra travel time.
